snippet: Larry Brown has never been a long-term guy, to put it mildly, but that hasn't seemed to stop suitors like S.M.U.
abstract: Larry Brown has never been a long-term guy, to put it mildly, but that hasn't seemed to stop suitors like S.M.U.

headline.main: Waiting for Brown, S.M.U. Joins Legions of His Basketball Employers
